type.desc: [Both] Tells the component which player is to be used

color.desc: [Both] Color name for component from the [Quasar Color Pallete](https://quasar.dev/style/color-palette)

background-color.desc: [Both] Color name for component from the [Quasar Color Pallete](https://quasar.dev/style/color-palette)

big-play-button-color.desc: [Video] Color name for component from the [Quasar Color Pallete](https://quasar.dev/style/color-palette)

mobile-mode.desc: [Video] Use mobile logic for handling visibility of controls

sources.desc: [Both] The one or more sources for Video or Audio

source.desc: [Both] if this is set, then the `video.src` or `audio.src` will be set directly and the `sources` attribute will be ignored

poster.desc: [Video] The poster image to display before the video is loaded

tracks.desc: [Video] The one or more tracks for subtitle, captions, etc

label.desc: Label to use for selection purposes

track-language.desc: [Video] A value that corresponds to the 'label' attribute of the 'tracks' property. This will be the default language

preload.desc: [Video] Provides a hint to the browser about what the author thinks will lead to the best user experience

dense.desc: [Both] When true displays controls window on one line

hide-volume-slider.desc: [Both] When true the volume slider control will be hidden

dark.desc: [Both] When component is rendered on a dark background

autoplay.desc: [Both] Automatically start video/audio when it is ready to play

cross-origin.desc: [Both] Whether to use CORS for fetching assets

muted.desc: [Both] If the player should be muted

playsinline.desc: [Both] If the player should be inline (see video element playsinline)

loop.desc: [Both] If the player should automatically seek back to the start upon reaching the end of the video

show-spinner.desc: [Both] If the spinner should be displayed while video/audio is loading

spinner-size.desc: [Both] Pass a CSS unit to change spinner size. (Default: ‘5em’ for video, ‘3em’ for audio)

controls-display-time.desc: [Video] The amount of idle time in milliseconds to wait before hiding the controls

no-controls.desc: [Video] If set to true, the controls will never be displayed

playback-rates.desc: [Video] This is an array of one or more objects for playback rate (speed)

label.desc: The displayed label for user selection

value.desc: The value to use for playback rate

playback-rates.default: [ { label: '.5x', value: 0.5 }, { label: 'Normal', value: 1 }, { label: '1.5x', value: 1.5 }, { label: '2x', value: 2 } ]

playback-rate.desc: [Video] Corresponds to the value in playback-rates

content-class.desc: [Both] Class definitions to be attributed to the markdown container

content-style.desc: [Both] Style definitions to be attributed to the markdown container

loaded.desc: [Both] Emitted when the media has been loaded

ready.desc: [Both] Emitted when the media is ready to play. You cannot play/pause or setCurrentTime before this event

duration.desc: [Both] Emitted when the duration of the media has been determined

ended.desc: [Both] Emitted when the media has finished playing

error.desc: [Both] Emitted when there is a media error

MediaError.desc: For more information, look up `MediaError` from HTML 5 spec

paused.desc: [Both] Emitted when the media is paused

playing.desc: [Both] Emitted when the media starts playing. This will also emit after a pause or a wait

timeupdate.desc: [Both] Emitted wenever there is a time update (during play)

curTime.desc: The number play time in seconds

showing.desc: true/false if in fullscreen or not

waiting.desc: [Both] Emitted when the media player goes into a wait state (typically waiting while downloading)

showControls.desc: [Video] Emitted when the Controls are toggled

showing.desc: true/false if controls are showing or not
true/false if volume is muted or not

showControls.desc: [Video] Show the controls. Has no effect is already being displayed

hideControls.desc: [Video] Hide the controls. Has no effect is already being hidden

setCurrentTime.desc: [Both] Set the current time of the video/audio player (in seconds)

setVolume.desc: [Both] Sets the volume as a percent (0-100).

oldbrowser.desc: Slot for replacing the default old browser text

overlay.desc: Slot for replacing the default overlay

errorWindow.desc: Slot for replacing the default error window

controls.desc: Slot for replacing the default controls can be replaced

spinner.desc: Slot for replacing the default spinner/loading icon

bigPlayButton.desc: Slot for replacing the default big play button icon

displayTime.desc: Slot for replacing the default display time

positionSlider.desc: Slot for replacing the default positioning slider

durationTime.desc: Slot for replacing the default duration time

play.desc: Slot for replacing the default play icon

volume.desc: Slot for replacing the default volume icon

volumeSlider.desc: Slot for replacing the default volume slider

settings.desc: Slot for replacing the default settings icon

settingsMenu.desc: Slot for replacing the default Settings menu

fullscreen.desc: Slot for replacing the default fullscreen icon
